title: Ahmar Bubere - Executive Editor, Indo Gulf Times | Diaspora Journalism & Media Leader (India & Middle East)
description: Profile of Ahmar Bubere, Executive Editor of Indo Gulf Times. A leading voice in Diaspora Journalism, strengthening Indo-Gulf relations and Dawoodi Bohra community ties. Discover his journey in global media and cultural diplomacy.
ogTitle: Ahmar Bubere | Executive Editor & Media Strategist - Indo Gulf Times
ogDescription: Meet Ahmar Bubere, the driving force behind Indo Gulf Times. Explore his work in bridging India and the Middle East through influential journalism and civic leadership.

@graph.name: Ahmar Bubere - Executive Editor & Media Leader
@graph.description: Profile of Ahmar Bubere, Executive Editor of Indo Gulf Times. A leading voice in Diaspora Journalism, strengthening Indo-Gulf relations.

@graph.name: Ahmar Bubere
@graph.description: Ahmar Bubere is the Executive Editor of the Indo Gulf Times and a specialist in India-Middle East diaspora affairs. He upholds the legacy of Dr. Abdul Sami Bubere, focusing on cultural diplomacy and civic initiatives.
